div.h2: Welcome to Groton Area School District

p.a: NEW The District has launched a web page dedicated to the consolidation of information related to the Coronavirus/COVID19 pandemic situation.

br.p: Updated 04/09/2020. The Groton Area School District will now be closed through the end of the 2019-2020 school year. We will continue to move forward with our alternative learning plan making adjustments as necessary.
We encourage everyone in the community to follow the recommendations of social distancing, appropriate hygiene, and staying home when ill to protect the welfare of all members of our community.
